SEARCH

Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
Medicine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Medicine extends Object implements Serializable
Tracks and prints medicine details (name, quantity, stock level alert) to the console Implements Serializable for persistent storage.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Medicine

      public Medicine(String medicineName, double medicineCost, int stock, int alertBelow)
      Constructs a new Medicine with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine
      medicineCost - The cost per unit of the medicine
      stock - The initial stock quantity
      alertBelow - The threshold below which stock alerts are triggered

  • Method Details

    • deserialize

      protected static Map<String,Medicine> deserialize()
      Deserializes medicine data from a file.
      Returns:
      Map of medicine names to Medicine objects, or null if deserialization fails

    • serialize

      protected static boolean serialize(Map<String,Medicine> allMedicines)
      Using a new HashMap to serialize medical records to a file
      Parameters:
      allMedicines - Map of medicines to serialize
      Returns:
      true if serialization is successful, false otherwise

    • getMedicineCost

      public double getMedicineCost()
      Gets the cost per unit of the medicine.
      Returns:
      double The cost of one unit of this medicine

    • replenishStock

      public void replenishStock(int replenishAmount)
      Increases the stock quantity by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      replenishAmount - The amount to add to current stock

    • decreaseStock

      public void decreaseStock(int decreaseAmount)
      Decreases the stock quantity by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      decreaseAmount - The amount to subtract from current stock

    • setAlertLevel

      public void setAlertLevel(int alertBelow)
      Updates the stock alert threshold.
      Parameters:
      alertBelow - The new threshold for low stock alerts

    • checkStockLevel

      public boolean checkStockLevel()
      Checks if current stock is at or below alert threshold.
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if stock is at or below alert level, false if stock is above alert level

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints medicine details (name, quantity, stock level alert) to the console
